greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers, the odd bisection of A241909 halved; equally, a composition of A064216 and A241909: a(n) = A241909(A064216(n)).
comment: Are there any other fixed points than 1, 2, 18 and 72?
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..512
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(1) = 1, and for n>=2, a(n) = A241909(2n-1)/2. Equally, a(n) = ceiling(A241909(2n-1)/2) for all n.
As a composition of related permutations:
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 01 2014
